about_the_game: This free DLC, Mirror Party Emoji, contains 54 Emojis of 9 characters. After and installing this DLC, please go to your Steam Library → Mirror Party → Right Click → Property → Local Files → Browse... → Mirror Party Emoji.
detailed_description: This free DLC, Mirror Party Emoji, contains 54 Emojis of 9 characters. After and installing this DLC, please go to your Steam Library → Mirror Party → Right Click → Property → Local Files → Browse... → Mirror Party Emoji.
name: Mirror Party Emoji
